title: GEN Ecovillages
description: Ecovillage projects in the Global Ecovillage Network.

_subtitle.title: Mission Statement, Subtitle or Focus
_subtitle.description: Brief statement which most accurately summarizes your group's primary purpose and/or focus. (maximum 100 characters)

gen_post_content.title: Community Description
gen_post_content.description: Share about your community! Here you can include your origin story, your group's principles and purpose and what you aspire to together. Be mindful that questions below may address many details. (maximum 2,000 characters)

gen_post_excerpt.title: Summary
gen_post_excerpt.description: A brief summary of the project, used when multiple projects are listed on one page. (maximum 400 characters)

gen_tax_post_language.title: Project Listing Language
gen_tax_post_language.description: Language this entry is written in.

gen_tax_community_type.title: Community Type
gen_tax_community_type.description: How does your community identify itself? (Select up to 5 options or select “Unspecified, Other” if none apply)

gen_lat_lng.title: Location
gen_lat_lng.description: Click on the map to set a pointer to the location of this project. You can zoom the map in/out and/or search for the location in the search field. Please be as precise as possible.

gen_emails.title: Contact email addresses
gen_emails.description: Click the button below to add email addresses. If you enter more than one email address, the first will be considered your primary contact email.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.description:
To list your ecovillage on this site you must agree to the following terms by checking the box below:
  • All data given is, to the best of my knowledge, correct and up to date.
  • Apart from private contact data, I consent to GEN listing this information on its website and sharing it with third parties.
  • GEN, at it's sole discretion, may amend or remove this listing.
  • I will use reasonable efforts to keep this data up to date.

gen_address_type.title: Does your community have an address?

enumNames: Yes, but it is private (your address will not be listed on this site)
No, but we generally know where it will be (please enter your approximate location below)

properties.title: Contact
properties.description: Please enter your ecovillage's contact information below. This information is public and will be listed on our website.

gen_tels.title: Telephone numbers
gen_tels.description: Click the button below to add telephone numbers. Please enter numbers in full international format beginning with country code, e.g. +44 1234 567 890

gen_websites.title: Websites
gen_websites.description: Click the button below to add any related websites. Website addresses should include http:// or https://

gen_twitter.title: Twitter handle
gen_twitter.description: Just your Twitter handle - do not include http or @

gen_project_members.title: Project members
gen_project_members.description: How many people live in the ecovillage?

gen_tax_new_members.title: New members
gen_tax_new_members.description: Is your community open to new members?
enumNames: Not currently(but there is a list or possibly in the future)

gen_tax_visitors.title: Visitors
gen_tax_visitors.description: Is your community open to visitors?

gen_project_join_info.title: Joining information
gen_project_join_info.description: Please describe what someone should do if they would like to join your community. (max 2000 characters)

gen_year_start_planing.title: What year did you start planning?

gen_year_start.title: What year was your community founded?

gen_tax_tag.title: Community Keywords
gen_tax_tag.description: A list of up to 8 keywords, separated by commas, associated with your community. You can add your own keywords by clicking on the + button.

gen_posttype_networks.title: Network Memberships
gen_posttype_networks.description: If you are a member of any networks in our database, select them here.

gen_posttype_projects.title: Community Affiliation
gen_posttype_projects.description: If you are affiliated with any other projects in our database, select them here.

gen_member_of.title: Other Affiliations
gen_member_of.description: If you are a member of any other organizations or networks, enter them here.

_thumbnail_id.title: Primary Image
_thumbnail_id.description:
Click the button below to upload. This is your primary image that displays at the top of your listing and in search results.
Images must be in jpg format, at least 500px wide and no more than 4000px wide. Image file size must be no more than 3MB.

gen_post_header_img_id.title: Header Image
gen_post_header_img_id.description:
Click the button below to upload. If uploaded this will be used in the header at the top of your listing's page.
Images must be in jpg format, at least 1500px wide and no more than 4000px wide. 2000px wide and 1000px tall is ideal. Image file size must be no more than 3MB.

gen_image_gallery.title: Galeery Images
gen_image_gallery.description:
Click the button below to upload images. These are images to show what life at your community is like.
Images must be in jpg format, at least 500px wide and no more than 4000px wide. Image file size must be no more than 3MB.

gen_video.title: Videos
gen_video.description: Add your Youtube or Vimeo videos to be displayed on your listing page. The first video listed will be embedded in your listing page, others will be linked to.

video_id.title: Video ID
video_id.description: Just the ID for your video (not the full URL)

video_description.title: Description
video_description.description: Brief description of video (maximum 80 characters, no html)

message.title: Private Information
message.description: Information in this section will not be listed publicly and will only be used if we need to contact your ecovillage directly and the public information doesn't work.

gen_alt_contact_private.title: Alternative Contact Information
gen_alt_contact_private.description: All fields in this section are required

gen_book_inclusion.title: Book Inclusion
gen_book_inclusion.description: Do you want your community to appear in GEN and partner books such as the Communities Directory book?

gen_enable_comments.title: Allow Comments
gen_enable_comments.description: Allow public comments and discussion at the bottom of your listing page?

author.title: Hide author?
author.description: Select hide to hide your name as the author of this ecovillage
